command.text: select "CoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" "CoaDetailID" ,"CoaDetail"."AccFundID" "AccFundID" ,"AccFund"."AccFundName" "AccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetail"."AccFundCode" "AccFundCode" ,"CoaDetail"."Acccode" "Acccode" ,"CoaDetail"."AccName" "AccName" ,"CoaDetail"."AccDesc" "AccDesc" ,"CoaDetail"."AccTypeID" "AccTypeID" ,"AccType"."AccType" "AccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetail"."AccDestID" "CoaControlID" ,"CoaControl"."AccName" "CoaControlAccName" ,"CoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaControlAccDestAccDest" "CoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetail"."CoaSubID" "CoaSubID" ,"CoaSub"."AccName" "CoaSubAccName" ,"CoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaSubAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "CoaSubAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"CoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaSubAccType"."AccType" "CoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaSubCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaSubCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaSubCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaSubCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaSubCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "CoaSubCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaSubCoaControlCompType"."Description" "CoaSubCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"CoaSubCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaSubCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaSubCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaSubCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaSubCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaSubCoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaSubCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "CoaSubCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaSubCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaSubCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetail"."CoaMainID" "CoaMainID" ,"CoaMain"."AccName" "CoaMainAccName" ,"CoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaMainAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "CoaMainAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"CoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaMainAccType"."AccType" "CoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaMainCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaMainCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaMainCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaMainCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaMainCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "CoaMainCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaMainCoaControlCompType"."Description" "CoaMainCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetail"."TranCode" "TranCode" ,"CoaDetail"."SubsYN" "SubsYN" ,"CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" "AccSubTypeID" ,"AccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"CoaDetail"."OpenDate" "OpenDate" ,"CoaDetail"."OpenDebit" "OpenDebit" ,"CoaDetail"."OpenCredit" "OpenCredit" ,"CoaDetail"."AccCurrencyRate" "AccCurrencyRate" ,"CoaDetail"."Revenue" "Revenue" ,"CoaDetail"."VariableCost" "VariableCost" ,"CoaDetail"."MonthlyExp" "MonthlyExp" ,"CoaDetail"."Budget" "Budget" ,"CoaDetail"."Annex" "Annex" ,"CoaDetail"."Dlt" "Dlt" ,"CoaDetail"."IsCashNature" "IsCashNature" ,"CoaDetail"."IsBankNature" "IsBankNature" ,"CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID1" "AccSubTypeID1" ,"CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID2" "AccSubTypeID2" ,"CoaDetail"."BankName" "BankName" ,"CoaDetail"."BankAccNum" "BankAccNum" ,"CoaDetail"."BranchName" "BranchName" ,"CoaDetail"."BankAccType" "BankAccType" from "dbo"."CoaDetail" "CoaDetail" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "AccFund" on "CoaDetail"."AccFundID" = "AccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "AccType" on "CoaDetail"."AccTypeID" = "AccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "AccDest" on "CoaDetail"."AccDestID" = "AccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "AccDestCompanyType" on "AccDest"."CompanyType" = "AccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "AccBalType" on "CoaDetail"."AccBalTypeID" = "AccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "AccCurrency" on "CoaDetail"."AccCurrency" = "AccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaControl" on "CoaDetail"."CoaControlID" = "CoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaControlAccDest" on "CoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaControlAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaControlAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaControlAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaControlAccType" on "CoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaControlCompType" on "CoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "CoaSub" on "CoaDetail"."CoaSubID" = "CoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaSubAccBalType" on "CoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaSubAccDest" on "CoaSub"."AccDestID" = "CoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaSubAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaSubAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaSubAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaSubAccFund" on "CoaSub"."AccFundID" = "CoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaSubAccType" on "CoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "CoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaSubCoaControl" on "CoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "CoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaSubCoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaSubCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaSubCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaSubCoaControlAccDest" on "CoaSubCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaSubCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaSubCoaControlAccType" on "CoaSubCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaSubCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaSubCoaControlCompType" on "CoaSubCoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaSubCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaSubCoaMain" on "CoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "CoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaSubCoaMainAccBalType" on "CoaSubCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaSubCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaSubCoaMainAccDest" on "CoaSubCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "CoaSubCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaSubCoaMainAccFund" on "CoaSubCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "CoaSubCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaSubCoaMainAccType" on "CoaSubCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "CoaSubCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaSubCoaMainCoaControl" on "CoaSubCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "CoaSubCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaMain" on "CoaDetail"."CoaMainID" = "CoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaMainAccBalType" on "CoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaMainAccDest" on "CoaMain"."AccDestID" = "CoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaMainAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaMainAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaMainAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaMainAccFund" on "CoaMain"."AccFundID" = "CoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaMainAccType" on "CoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "CoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaMainCoaControl" on "CoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "CoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaMainCoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaMainCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaMainCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaMainCoaControlAccDest" on "CoaMainCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaMainCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaMainCoaControlAccType" on "CoaMainCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaMainCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaMainCoaControlCompType" on "CoaMainCoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaMainCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubType" on "CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubType"."AccSubTypeID"
